name: Quentin Petiteville
title: Software Engineering Student
description:
I'm a passionate developer who builds accessible, clean digital experiences by blending software engineering and project leadership. 
My journey has been filled with diverse projects and valuable lessons that I now apply in my work during my final year of software engineering studies.
availability: Available for a 6-month internship starting 4th of March 2026 !

focus: Modern Software Engineering and Product-driven development
Seamless design and delivery, from concept to shipped product
Bilingual collaboration across French and English teams

stats.label: Currently
stats.value: Second-year Master’s student in Software Engineering

sidebar.title: What I bring to your team

highlights.title: Product-minded engineering that delivers
highlights.description: I turn thoughtful UX into fast, inclusive, and reliable products teams can trust.

craft.title: Clean interfaces
craft.description: Design systems, responsive layouts, and inclusive interactions that make complex products feel simple.

performance.title: Performance obsessed
performance.description: Measure, iterate, and optimize for speed and stability — from concept to real-world usage.

collaboration.title: Team-first collaborator
collaboration.description: Pair with designers, product owners, and stakeholders to clarify requirements and ship reliable releases on time.

delivery.title: End-to-end delivery
delivery.description: From idea to production: plan, automate quality checks, and iterate with feedback to achieve measurable impact.

projectsPreview.title: My works
projectsPreview.description: An overview of my latest projects :

items.summary: Rebuilt the the Music Story website : migration of WordPress content to Next.js/Tailwind CSS, with improved performance and maintainability.
Managed client-driven projects while designing and developing websites, crafting algorithms, and cleaning databases to meet every requirement.

ctaBanner.title: Ready to build your next project?
ctaBanner.description: I am looking for an internship starting March 4, 2026, in order to actively contribute to high-impact projects and learn from an ambitious team.
